name: pregnable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be attacked or entered: Many of these borders have historically been porous and pregnable. The documentary featured a team of ex-prisoners attempting to break into this thoroughly pregnable building.
easy to beat, especially in sport: The injury leaves the team with just one defensive midfielder to protect a dangerously pregnable defence. They had five wins, alongside two narrow defeats in the barely pregnable strongholds of Limerick and Paris.
